item.title: Silly Polly Beast launches October 28
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Silly Polly Want a cracker?

Psychological survival action horror game Silly Polly Beast will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam on October 28 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET, publisher Top Hat Studios and developer Anji Games announced. It will support English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, and Ukrainian language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via Top Hat Studios:

Embrace Your Inner Demon, or Be Consumed by It

In Silly Polly Beast, you’ll traverse the nightmarish and often abstract depth of the underworld. Traversing through the dreaded fog, you’ll engage in aggressive gun fights, outsmart enemies, sneak in the shadows, solve puzzles, work with unlikely allies, and travel with your trusty skateboard.

Encounter Otherworldly Denizens

The underworld is filled with many odd figures—some of which may not be on your side, but not necessarily against you. Along the way, no matter what events may unfold, never forget the pact you made which plunged you into this abyss.

Eclectic, Genre-Bending Gameplay

Silly Polly Beast features a truly unique gameplay experience, blending fluid world exploration and puzzle solving with perspective-shifting battles. As you traverse the world, Polly’s powers will grow deadlier—and separately, so will her skateboarding skills! As the narrative deepens, you’ll come across an eclectic blend of top-down and side-scrolling shooter segments, survival horror segments, and even skateboarding. Master forbidden spells and find the only thing left that matters to you—Alice.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/silly-polly-beast-launches-october-28

item.title: Isometric action RPG Decision: Red Daze now available for PS5, Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Previously released for PC.

Publisher Nordcurrent Labs and developer FlyAnvil have released isometric action RPG Decision: Red Daze for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series for $19.99.

Decision: Red Daze first launched for PC via Steam on May 19, 2022.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nordcurrent Labs:

About

Decision: Red Daze is an isometric action RPG with a unique spin on survival and tower defense mechanics.

The Dust Bowl, once a “thriving” society of corrupt politicians, rich property barons and everyday people who work for them “100% willingly,” has been overtaken by a mysterious phenomenon only known by survivors as the Red Daze. As the illness takes hold of the survivors and turns them into crazed and EXTREMELY dangerous mutated creatures, the worlds’ governments are running around like headless chickens. It falls to the few who remain to fend off the monsters in hopes of finding a way to eradicate the Red Daze once and for all.

Key Features

  • Play as Anyone – Even the lowliest survivor you find has the potential to lead his own squad, explore, make the wasteland safe, and shape their own destiny. It’s up to you to upgrade and specialize any survivor you find in the wasteland any way you see fit.
  • Explore, Loot, and Capture – While most of the buildings of the Dust Bowl are long abandoned and taken over by the undead, the loot and potential shelter is coveted by most survivors. During your exploration missions you’ll come across various farmsteads, factories and military installations full to the brim with monsters, loot, and most importantly, foundations that hold the potential to turn the long abandoned structures into sprawling and heavily fortified settlements.
  • Your Own Safe Haven – With survivors from all over the wasteland pouring into your settlements for safety, it’s smart to keep them occupied. Assign them to build factories to make food, fabricate resources or make useful goods to barter with, put up and upgrade defenses, and in the event of an attack, task your best soldiers to protect your settlements while you’re away or join the battle yourself and help push back the monsters coming to take what’s yours!
  • Scout Out Your Competition – The packs of monsters always have a leader. Plan ahead, strategically assemble your squad of specialists to maximize your odds of survival, and head out on exploration and scouting missions. Gather vital intelligence on the monsters’ movements to better defend your settlements, or find and eliminate the bosses to stop the attacks altogether.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series Launch Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/isometric-action-rpg-decision-red-daze-now-available-for-ps5-xbox-series

item.title: Octopath Traveler 0 details Pardis III, more travelers, and more Town Building elements
item.content:encoded:
Publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Dokidoki Grooveworks have released new information and screenshots for Octopath Traveler 0, detailing the ruler of the Kingdom of Edoras, Pardis III; travelers Pius, Saoirse, Carinda, and Xerc; and more of the Town Building system.

Get the details below.

■ Latest Information

Set on the continent of Orsterra, the world of the original Octopath Traveler, Octopath Traveler 0 is a story of revenge and restoration surrounding the divine rings.

This time, we will introduce the tyrannical monarch plotting to seize control of Orsterra, your companions who will stand against his ambitions alongside you, and a few of the unique and unusual facilities you can construct through Town Building.

■ Master of All: Pardis III, Ruler of All

The absolute monarch who rules the Kingdom of Edoras, with Wealth, Power, and Fame all at his command.

His insatiable greed knows no bounds, as he initiates an invasion to seize Orsterra in its entirety.

The embers of war scatter and spread across several nations, igniting countless tragedies—.

Can you, Ringbearer chosen, shatter the tyrannical monarch’s ambitions?

The greed of the Master of All looms over the land of Orsterra—!

■ Travelers: Companions on Your Adventure

Pius (voiced by Todd Haberkorn in English)

  • Job: Cleric.

A bishop of the Order of the Sacred Flame. A distant relative of the protagonist’s mother, who showed him great kindness when he was a child. He now hopes to return the favor.

—Ultimate Technique: Scales of Justice

Lowers physical / elemental defense of all foes and raises physical / elemental attack of all allies for several turns.

Saoirse (voiced by Brianna Knickerbocker in English)

  • Job: Dancer.

A traveling dancer who has unique artistic tastes. She possesses extraordinary vocal talent and seeks a partner who shares her sensibilities and can join her on stage.

—Ultimate Technique: Ruinous Aria

Grants an ally the ability to exploit weaknesses regardless of weak points for several turns.

Carinda (voiced by Eric Mendez in English)

  • Job: Merchant.

A merchant who grew up in a small village on the outskirts of the Riverlands. She worms her way into people’s hearts with her warmth and friendliness and uses her great business sense to ensure she never misses an opportunity to make some leaves.

—Ultimate Technique: Trick of the Trade

Raises physical attack of all allies for several turns, and grants them the ability to dodge physical attacks one time.

Xerc (voiced by Adam Korenman in English)

  • Job: Scholar.

A scholar who researches soulstones and is regarded as an eccentric within academic circles. His talented assistant is attempting to gather funds so that he can study a gargantuan soulstone.

—Ultimate Technique: Soulstone’s Might

Deals Fire / Ice / Lightning / Wind / Light / Dark damage to all foes one time each.

■ Town Building

The Monster Arena

The Monster Arena can be built by progressing through your adventure.

Unlock the monster “capture list” and “arena matches” to face off against your captive monsters!

Complete capture requests and win matches to earn various rewards!

The Museum

Relish in the music obtained from “music scores” throughout your journey, revisit those adventurous memories through “journals,” and proudly display “treasures of legend” rumored to lie dormant in locations still undiscovered. Wishvale’s background music is also customizable, so gather your favorite music scores and configure its tune to your liking!



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/octopath-traveler-0-details-pardis-iii-more-travelers-and-more-town-building-elements

item.title: Death by Scrolling launches October 28 for PC, later for PlayStation, Xbox, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Vertically scrolling roguelike RPG dated.

Vertically scrolling roguelike RPG Death by Scrolling will launch for PC via Steam on October 28, followed by PlayStation, Xbox, and Switch at a later date, publisher MicroProse and Ron Gilbert studio Terrible Toybox announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Welcome to Death by Scrolling, a roguelike vertically scrolling RPG set in the chaotic depths of Purgatory, now under new management! Choose your character—each with unique perks and abilities, and race upward through endless levels. Battle bizarre monsters, dodge death itself, and collect gems to pay the Ferryman’s exorbitant fee: 10,000 gold! With each screen inching upward, time is never on your side. Outsmart the Grim Reaper, grab power-ups, complete quirky side quests, and shop from vendors mid-run. Stay alive, pay your dues, and maybe, just maybe, you’ll cross that river.

Key Features

  • Varied Cast of Characters – Select from multiple playable characters, each offering distinct abilities and perks to suit your playstyle.
  • Vertically Scrolling Mayhem – Constant upward movement means no time to rest—let the fiery bottom of the screen catch you, and it’s game over.
  • Relentless Pursuit – The Grim Reaper is always close by—stun, dodge, and outmaneuver, but never kill him!
  • Loot and Progression – Collect gold and precious gems to unlock upgrades, power-ups, and abilities from quirky vendors.
  • Bonus Runs and Side Quests – Discover extra challenges and side quests at the top of each level for extra rewards.
  • Monster Mash – Battle quirky underworld creatures, from hellish pests to demonic bosses, all in a wild vertical sprint.
  • Quirky Lore and Humor – A tongue-in-cheek take on afterlife bureaucracy, with cheeky dialogues and playful narration.
  • Leaderboards – See how your purgatorial performance stacks up against other trapped souls.

Choose your hero. Outsmart death. Outrun scrolling. Earn your passage. Are you ready to survive Purgatory?

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/death-by-scrolling-launches-october-28-for-pc-later-for-playstation-xbox-and-switch
